product_name: Capita Black Snowboard of Death Snowboard - 2013/2014
long_description: Completely redesigned for 2013/2014, the Capita Black Snowboard of Death features a cambered mid-section, a flat tail, and a rockered nose that give you insane pop, amazing float and tons of control. Reverse cambered tip ensures amazing float in powder, while the flat tail gives you a platform to load up pop when in the park; traditional cambered mid-section. Engineered specifically for this flagship model, the Superlight Hover Core features thin-cut wood strips combined with composite webbing for lightweight and strong performance. Custom Weave fiberglass combines with the lightweight core to give you increased strength, durability and a higher energy return without weighing you down. Pre-curved 30mm carbon stringers are shaped to counter the board's camber profile, increasing the board's energy when flexed for amazing power when throwing ollies. ABS sidewalls; steel edges; wax-infused sintered base; aluminum logo base inlay; silk-screened topsheet. .
short_description: Completely redesigned for 2013/2014, the Capita Black Snowboard of Death features a cambered mid-section, a flat tail, and a rockered nose that give you insane pop, amazing float and tons of control.
